website_summaries.verdict: Caterpillar design is a fun, different way to display your favorite flowers.
pros: Set of 6 vases are all attached for a unique caterpillar design
Each vase holds a single flower
Fits easily on most windowsills and makes a perfect low-height centerpiece
cons: Tiny opening makes these vases difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice little holder for small flowers. My grandchildren are always bringing me flowers from my garden or even the park with very short stems and this vase gives me a beautiful way to display them. I also have some flowers that are just perfect for this small catapiller vase. Quality is good and I dropped the box on our hardwood floor and was happy to open it to find no damage so I’d say the packaging is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: B. McConn

customer_reviews.title: Great delicate vase!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently gifted a flower subscription so set off to find ways to spread a bouquet throughout the apartment. This is a perfect way to display little flowers and pieces of the arrangement. There are little imperfections, I think the holes don’t exactly line up evenly. But it’s not noticeable really. The bulbs are connected so water can flow through. Picture is showing dried flowers without water. Small size, spoon for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a bud vase, not a flower vase
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, this is a very small vase. It's actually a bud vase, not a flower vase, so the title is deceiving. It's designed to have each "bubble" hold a single, small flower. You can't put six gerbera daisies in this (they're too large/heavy), but you could put six wild daisies or six black-eyed susans. I got this for my mom on Mother's Day and she keeps it on the windowsill in her kitchen with cut wildflowers from her garden. It is glass, not plastic, and fairly thin so you'll have to be gentile with it. Mine arrived poorly packed in just a padded envelope but surprisingly it was undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeDragon

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift- 5 star vase
customer_reviews.text: I gave this vase to my mother as a gift and she loved it. it is so cool, i may purchase one for my own home. I like it's low profile which doesn't take up much room. I also think its unique in that you only fill water up in one hole, and based on its design, water is allowed to flow freely through each of the 4 "pods". Very unique vase and great gift idea. Service of seller was outstanding, and they proactively reached out to me via email to ensure I was happy with purchase, and confirm it arrived in the mail in one piece. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: P. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: CHECK SIZES BEFORE YOU CHECKOUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice vase for what it is. I guess I was rushing and didn’t notice this came in sizes. I ordered the small one and it is definitely small. I’m thinking about returning it because honestly for $18-$19 it isn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KTM

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: For years I have needed a very small bud vase for those times when I was arranging a bouquet of fresh flowers, and some of them broke off by accident. I always hated to throw them away. This vase is perfect for small flowers and buds. And it could not look any more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkster

customer_reviews.title: Going with the small one
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't decide weather to get the large or the small of these vases, but I went with the large. It felt too big for dining table! It would be fine but I felt like if I didn't put large flowers in it, or multiple flowers in each vase, then it would look wimpy. So I returned it and am getting the small one. Besides all that it was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Xodani

customer_reviews.title: It turned out absolutely adorable, and her mother loved it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend purchased this item to use as a Mother's Day gift for his young daughter to give to her mom. They walked around outside and picked out flowers together to place inside each little vase. It turned out absolutely adorable, and her mother loved it! It was an original and thoughtful gift idea that came together perfectly, and I was even a little jealous after I saw how cute it had turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what I ordered and expected
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar vase for several years and loved it... would keep little blooms of some sort all through the year and then one day it got knocked off the counter and broken. I missed displaying tiny blossoms or greenery so I went searching and surprisingly I found it. I will be ordering more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: K Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the caterpillar!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a flower person, the caterpillar makes for a beautiful and unusual arrangement on a dinner table. It's not so tall that guests across the table can't be seen and it allows for a pretty display of flowers. This is my second caterpillar and I love it. At a recent dinner with friends, it was much admired -- as were the flowers. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hausammann

customer_reviews.title: Propagation Station 🌿✨
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little vase for propagating plants! I’ll definitely be ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print!  These are smaller than expected but still lovely.
customer_reviews.text: These vases were so much smaller than expected. What was more frustrating was the way they were packed but this was done by Amazon. This item is unique and and an unusual gift. Jessie's Flower Shop was so willing to replace what was broken, even though it was not their fault. Thank you for the wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed on the size
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed on the size. It is TINY!! ( I should have read the measurements, so I suppose it's my fault!)
customer_reviews.author: LopeDeVega

customer_reviews.title: Cute little vase! 🌿🌹
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Smaller than I thought but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl33

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, minimal.
customer_reviews.text: Great vase. Creates a floral display using only a few stems - result looks much more expensive than it is! Would look great on a fireplace mantel if I had one. Using as dining table centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Lifer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing. The exact size I need-it fits perfectly on a window sill without interfering with my mini blinds. Well pack, and shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: lazy cook

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent my fault but I was looking for more ...
customer_reviews.text: 100 percent my fault but I was looking for more space between the flowers. I tried to recreate the look with the tulips and the vase was imply to small and compact to pull of the look irl. I ended up buying different vases for the table at the event I purchased this item for. If your table is larger that 4 feet get two.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth Neve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful, true to picture. Great quality and protected well for shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Way too small! Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: The vase is way too small and absolutely not what we expected. We were looking for something small but I even wonder what kind/size of flowers we are supposed to put in there! The idea is nice but this size is an extra-extra small! We needed that for an event but now can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Glover

customer_reviews.title: I think it's adorable, and will be perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for a young girl who just got her first apartment. It arrived quickly and was as described. I think it's adorable, and will be perfect for her. My only comment is to read the description of the size. It is smaller than I expected, but that is because I didn't read the size.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Fits my table beautifully and doesn't take up too much room. Put fresh flowers in it and it was a success. Each budvase actually holds more than you'd think but can easily hold a single flower. I am trying roses next time! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this little vase. Have filled it with mini carnations in our guest room, and it is adorable. A little smaller than I envisioned, but that isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: donnar59

customer_reviews.title: It's adorable, but the packaging was very thin
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable, but the packaging was very thin. I was so surprised to see that it didn't break because there was no protection whatsoever for the vase. It was basically in a thin bubblewrap envelope. Other than that, the vase was cute.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Showed up completely smashed in pieces
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a sift package. Glass in a soft package? Why on earth would anyone do that. Of course it showed up to my hone in a million little pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Afshin Sabouri

customer_reviews.title: I really like and have enjoyed using my caterpillar vase
customer_reviews.text: I really like and have enjoyed using my caterpillar vase. It only takes a few flowers in this great vase to brighten up the room. The size is perfect too, it fits in so many different spots throughout my home. It was given to me as a gift and I have purchased several since then for others as gifts. All items have arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Scarbrough

customer_reviews.title: It came very quickly (I needed it by Christmas and am habitually bad at early shopping) and was packaged appropriately in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This bud vase is small, as people have stated, but it is a bud vase: intended for single flower buds! It came very quickly (I needed it by Christmas and am habitually bad at early shopping) and was packaged appropriately in my opinion. The vase itself is adorable, very well made and petite but elegant. The recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: Small flowers
customer_reviews.text: Small flowers look beautiful in this. I like it in the spring with lilies of the valley. So pretty. It takes just a few to create a pretty arrangement
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L Maki

customer_reviews.title: Flat sides, not round
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but the sides aren't round, they're flat. Def not as shown.

customer_reviews.title: Cute small vase
customer_reviews.text: Very cute vase. Smaller than I expected, but it should look adorable with some small flowers lined up. I am looking forward to using it!

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fill vase
customer_reviews.text: Cutest ever vase. Looks fragile but very sturdy. mom loves to put small flowere from the yard in it.

customer_reviews.text: I just love these little bud vases......keep them on my kitchen windowsill all the time and love to give them as a thank you gift with a small bouquet of flowers.........

customer_reviews.title: I bought a vase for myself and loved it so much that I bought several more for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a vase for myself and loved it so much that I bought several more for gifts. The recipients of the vases have expressed how much they enjoy their vases. I love that you can fill the entire vase by simply putting water in one of the openkngs instead of filling each individually. I will probably buy more for gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Great way of presenting few left over flowers from a ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. But the major problem is that the openings over each globe are very small and almost impossible to clean this after flowers have been in it a while. Threw it out.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sweet little vases ❤️ I purchased one for myself then two others for gifts.

customer_reviews.title: guess you can say that I love them. Mine is sitting on a narrow window ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth vase that I purchased,guess you can say that I love them . Mine is sitting on a narrow window sill over my sink. Love to go out in the garden and cut wild flowers. Lots of compliments!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and wonderful customer service. I bought two and put them side to side for a longer "caterpillar". I get tons of compliments!

customer_reviews.title: The glass is beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: The glass is beautiful and well made. The dimensions of the vase are much smaller than I imagined they would be.

customer_reviews.title: Great table top accessory
customer_reviews.text: A delightful addition to a table.....all kind of flowers fit this multi-vase.

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was quick and packaged nicely and safely
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was quick and packaged nicely and safely. I love this vase! I love how you can just take little snippets of your garden into your home. It is perfect for our kitchen and bathroom!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Perfect for little buds or flowers from the garden. Makes a nice gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They both loved them. Excited to see them in the spring ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for both my mom and mother-in-law. They both loved them. Excited to see them in the spring with clippings from the garden.

customer_reviews.title: They are a sweet little size for individual flowers
customer_reviews.text: Gave this little vase to my mom for Christmas. They are a sweet little size for individual flowers. It makes a pretty display on a windowsill or small table centerpiece. It's very light and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for the perfect caterpillar vase for years and I finally found it! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: A little bit small
customer_reviews.text: The large one is a bit on the large side, and this one is a bit on the small side. It would only hold some very small buds. I really like it, the size just wasn't what I was imaging. I am going to use it to hold some small succulents.
customer_reviews.author: Xodani

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS FLOWER VASE
customer_reviews.text: this beautiful 4 ball glass vase is the most stunning show stopper I've ever had! looks gorgeous with one flower in each vase or a couple of smaller ones bunched together to match any decor....im totally in love!! i use it as a centerpiece on a small 4 chair table and add flowers to match the decor of the dining dishes. its low enough that it doesnt block conversation but its showy enough to add that perfect touch of elegance where needed!!!! go ahead and buy it ;)...youll never regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This vase is tiny! You can hardly fit any ...
customer_reviews.text: This vase is tiny! You can hardly fit any flower in each spot. I must not have read the dimensions, but the photo is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Gaspar

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for violets, little spring bulbs, sprigs of foliage, miniature treasures!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find really small vases for little cuttings and flowers. I was searching several years ago for something short enough to display violets, primroses, Scilla 'Spring Beauty', small roses, fritillarias, miniature narcissus, and so forth, and came up empty. Trying again recently, I found this charming vase. It's just right! Fits on a windowsill or desk and its proportions don't dwarf the little flowers. I may buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: lady_of_mercia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mother's Day!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these vases. I bought the large version with 4 bubbles. The listed dimensions are a little off - the length is actually 15.2", but I actually liked this better :) The bulbs are connected by channels, so water flows from one bulb to the other. I bought an everyday bouquet and was able to fill two large caterpillar vases for Mother's Day. Vase would also be great for pothos or green onions (1-2 stems per bulb). Minus one star for sturdiness, because the glass is thin, marginally thicker than that of a light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I assumed it was. Fully admit I was quick shopping and just went off what the picture looked like. Be sure to check the measurements before you purchase. It is pretty! Just very tiny. More for a side table than the dining table like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: KitNikta

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Easy to Use Vase
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase.I have no flower arranging skills, and the vase is easy to use as it looks great with one flower in each section. Also, it is low which I wanted so people could see each other across my dining room table. I have also used it on my island, and it's lovely there as well. I used it at a recent party and received several compliments on it. I am very pleased with this purchase. I am also pleased with the seller's packing and sending of this vase. The vase was well-protected in it's own box, and it came promptly..
customer_reviews.author: brachl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and flowers lived a really long time

I have to carefully balance them and hope no one bumps it!

product_meta.title: Caterpillar, Clear Glass Bud Vase 10.25" Long 1" Wide 1.5" Tall for Short Flowers, Unique Low Sitting Flower Vase, Cute Floral Vase for Home Decor, Weddings, Floral Arrangements, Arranging
product_meta.description:
Size:SmallThe Caterpillar bud vase is one of Chive’s most popular small vases for flowers. 

Each Caterpillar vase is individually hand blown by a glass artisan making each an original work of art. The Caterpillar bud vase has been universally loved for it’s ability to make stunning arrangements for weddings, dinner tables, night stands, or even the windowsill, with just a few simple blooms.

One of the best things about small vases for flowers is that you can sneak them into any nook or cranny that needs a pop of color to liven it up.

For wedding and events, line up a row of Caterpillars end to end down the center of the table to create an illusion of droplets of water sprinkled down the table.

The Caterpillar bud vase is a connected row of glass bubbles, each with a small hole (approximately half an inch)

The Caterpillar bud vase is 10.25" long, 1" wide, 1.5" tall. 

Flowers We Love in this Vase: Baby Cymbidium Orchids, Ranunculous, Craspedia, Sweetpea, Kermit Mum, Waxwing, Hydrangea, Dandelions, Bouvardia, Spray Rose
feature_bullets: CHIVE INC was established over 15 years ago and they currently design and make thousands of glass and ceramic flower vases and other fun bits of home décor! In addition to all these vases they make over 200 plant pots of varying sizes, colors, materials, and textures. I am thrilled to offer on my Amazon page just a small selection of their catalog, including the most popular vase in Chive history, the Hudson Caterpillar.

UNIQUE MODERN FLOWER VASE: The Caterpillar is a floral vase for 6 single flowers. Each of the 6 round clear glass balls are joined together in a row. There is no separation between the balls so you only need to fill one hole with water and you will fill the whole vase.

SIMPLE ELEGANT DESIGN: This delicate and adorable bud vase is perfect for small short flowers, clippings from your garden. This light weight bud vase makes flower arranging fun and easy. Use this vase to make an elegant, low laying decorative centerpiece on your table for your next dinner party.

DECORATIVE HOME DÉCOR: Achieve a dramatic effect in the center of your table while still being able to look across the table and speak to your dinner guests without a large flower arrangement in the way. Looks cute on a kitchen window sill.
FLOWERS NOT INCLUDED / 10.25" long, 1" wide, 1.5" tall
